about_the_game:
Babsy, a former porn actress, wakes up abruptly in a deserted spa, surrounded by an eerie silence echoing off lifeless walls. The only traces of activity are old cameras, CRT televisions, and scattered VHS tapes as remnants of a forgotten past. With no memory, no explanation. Gradually, she discovers that she herself erased the memories that defined her. Each VHS tape holds a fragment of what once was her life, each recording a piece of the puzzle that may unveil the dark reason behind her amnesia.

As Babsy delves into the recordings, she uncovers a labyrinth of intertwined secrets: unfamiliar faces, familiar places, and a buried truth threatening her own identity. Her past as an adult film star haunts her as she navigates through the mysteries locked within each cassette. Each revelation brings deeper questions and imminent dangers, as she struggles to rebuild not just her memories, but also the sense of who she truly is.

The spa transforms into a stage of discovery and paranoia, where cameras watch every move and CRT televisions flicker with images that defy understanding. Babsy finds herself confronted with her past and a web of conspiracies and manipulations that place her in this game of memory and mystery.

Each tape reveals a piece of the puzzle but also brings forth the fear of what she might uncover about herself. In her quest for answers, she realizes the truth may be more disturbing than anything her imagination could conceive. As the spa becomes her labyrinth, Babsy must decide if she is ready to face the revelations that could change everything she believed she knew about her past and future.



This is a first-person game. The player must find important information inside the spa to help locate the VHS tapes needed to understand the story. The tapes' content includes graphically explicit images; some are presented as mini-documentaries. The VHS player works exactly like a real device. Place a one-page manual next to the device explaining how to use it. You can configure the game as you see fit. There is a V-Sync option if you prefer to maintain the frame rate according to your monitor settings (usually 60fps). You can also manually set it to 120fps or leave it flexible. As usual, you can adjust the game quality as needed.
This game was made in URP quality. It's not heavy, but it may demand more from your GPU.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit sex scenes and nudity. The character narrates her sexual exploits without any shame. There are moments of pleasure and eroticism. All characters presented are over 21 years old.

name: Grit Porn Video Tapes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10th Generation, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 16xx Family or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10th Generation, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070 or Radeon RX 5xxx XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 28 GB available space
